In response to conversation between @tomkeene and @ferrotv on @business... I never understood the view that eight percent cash is "elevated" and can protect you from market downdrafts... only the long only managers can think in those terms. ask yourself how did ten percent cash

help investors 2022?Given the uncertain backdrop I like the idea and have adopted the notion of having a large gross invested position (to capture alpha long and short) and a very low net invested position (to reduce exposure to vol and lower stock prices) @threadreaderapp unroll
I agree on intraday volatility just mentioned on @business with @tomkeene and @ferrotv ... to me the market has more moves than a short stop batting .110!
